snippet: Animal Kingdom, a Kentucky Derby winner who has been twice injured, will make his second start in 16 months in the Breeders’ Cup Mile.
abstract: Animal Kingdom, 2011 Kentucky Derby winner who has been twice injured, will make his second start in 16 months in the Breeders’ Cup Mile at Santa Anita Park in Arcadia, Calif.
lead_paragraph: Animal Kingdom, a Kentucky Derby winner who has been twice injured, will make his second start in 16 months in the Breeders’ Cup Mile.

headline.seo: Breeders’ Cup — Animal Kingdom to End Long Time Off
headline.main: Resilience of 2011 Derby Winner Will Be Tested
headline.print_headline: A Derby Winner’s Resilience Will Be Tested in the Mile
